original_title: Laugfs Gas to reduce prices tonight
original_body_lines: With the recent decision by Litro Gas to reduce the price of a 12.5 kg cylinder of domestic LP gas, Laugfs Gas too said today that they have lowered their prices as well.
A senior official of Laugfs Gas said the price reduction is expected to come into effect from midnight today (6).
With the price reduction, the price of 12.5 kg cylinder of LP gas will be reduced by Rs. 300 and the curent retail price will be Rs. 3,690.
The price of a 5kg cylinder of LP gas will be reduced by Rs. 120 and the new retail price will be Rs.1,486, he said. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
